title: Blueberry Crumb Muffins
ingredients: ['110g butter, softened', '150g caster sugar', '2 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '250g plain flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '120ml milk', '225g blueberries', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '2 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', '1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '2 tablespoons butter, chilled']
